rules.title: Be cool to each other
rules.desc: we’re here to have fun, so keep the chat friendly and respectful.

rules.title: Don’t mess with other people’s stuff
rules.desc: builds and chests aren’t yours unless you’ve got permission.

rules.title: Think of the server
rules.desc: avoid giant lag machines or packing hundreds of mobs into one spot.

rules.title: Redstone is welcome
rules.desc: just keep it tidy and efficient so it doesn’t drag the server down.

rules.title: Respect builds
rules.desc: don’t build right next to someone without checking first.

rules.title: Spawn is for everyone
rules.desc: projects around spawn should look good, keep the area tidy, and not block paths/portals.

rules.title: Shops go in town
rules.desc: keep your shops in the designated area so players know where to go.

rules.title: Locked chests are for shops only
rules.desc: don’t use them for private storage unless you’ve cleared it with the owner.

rules.title: Diamonds are the main currency
rules.desc: keep trades fair and simple using them.

rules.title: Make it look good
rules.desc: design your shop building so it’s easy to spot what's on sale.

rules.title: For testing only
rules.desc: use this world to try out redstone, design builds, or plan projects.

rules.title: No chaos
rules.desc: no griefing, boss fights, explosions, or random nonsense.

rules.title: Respect performance
rules.desc: avoid huge contraptions or setups that could lag the world.

rules.title: Be welcoming
rules.desc: help out new players and keep the vibe friendly.

rules.title: Keep chat fun
rules.desc: jokes and banter are fine, but keep it respectful.

rules.title: Speak up
rules.desc: if something breaks or feels off, let the admins know.
